argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dvdsabsb | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( M || N <-> M || ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> ( M || N <-> M || ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_nnabscl | |- ( ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> ( abs ` N ) e. NN ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dvdsle | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ ( abs ` N ) e. NN ) -> ( M || ( abs ` N ) -> M <_ ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ ( N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) ) -> ( M || ( abs ` N ) -> M <_ ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3impb | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> ( M || ( abs ` N ) -> M <_ ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_sylbid | |- ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> ( M || N -> M <_ ( abs ` N ) ) ) |
